returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.title: Return All

limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.title: Limit

bri.description: The brightness value to set the light to. Brightness is a scale from 1 (the minimum the light is capable of) to 254 (the maximum).
bri.title: Brightness

effect.description: The dynamic effect of the light
effect.title: Dynamic Effect

sat_inc.description: Increments or decrements the value of the sat. This value is ignored if the Saturation attribute is provided.
sat_inc.title: Saturation Increments

transitiontime.description: The duration in seconds of the transition from the light’s current state to the new state
transitiontime.title: Transition Time

ct.description: The Mired color temperature of the light. 2012 connected lights are capable of 153 (6500K) to 500 (2000K).
ct.title: Color Temperature

ct_inc.description: Increments or decrements the value of the ct. ct_inc is ignored if the ct attribute is provided.
ct_inc.title: Color Temperature Increments

xy_inc.description: Increments or decrements the value of the xy. This value is ignored if the Coordinates attribute is provided. Any ongoing color transition is stopped. Max value [0.5, 0.5]
xy_inc.title: Coordinates Increments

hue.description: The hue value to set light to.The hue value is a wrapping value between 0 and 65535. Both 0 and 65535 are red, 25500 is green and 46920 is blue.
hue.title: Hue

alert.description: The alert effect, is a temporary change to the bulb’s state
alert.title: Alert Effect

hue_inc.description: Increments or decrements the value of the hue. Hue Increments is ignored if the Hue attribute is provided.
hue_inc.title: Hue Increments

xy.description: The x and y coordinates of a color in CIE color space. The first entry is the x coordinate and the second entry is the y coordinate. Both x and y are between 0 and 1
xy.title: Coordinates

sat.description: Saturation of the light. 254 is the most saturated (colored) and 0 is the least saturated (white).
sat.title: Saturation

bri_inc.description: Increments or decrements the value of the brightness. This value is ignored if the Brightness attribute is provided.
bri_inc.title: Brightness Increments

anyOf.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
anyOf.title: Light Name or ID
